Name: Band of Sizzling Thunder
Four-Piece Effect: When the wearer uses Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by 20% for 1 turn(s).

Name: Champion of Streetwise Boxing
Four-Piece Effect: After the wearer attacks or is hit, their ATK increases by 5% for the rest of the battle. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).

Name: Eagle of Twilight Line
Four-Piece Effect: After the wearer uses Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by 25%.

Name: Firesmith of Lava-Forging
Four-Piece Effect: Increases the wearer's Skill DMG by 12%. After unleashing Ultimate, increases the wearer's Fire DMG by 12% for next attack.

Name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
Four-Piece Effect: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

Name: Guard of Wuthering Snow
Four-Piece Effect: At the beginning of the turn, if the wearer's HP is equal to or less than 50% of their Max HP, restores HP equal to 8% of their Max HP and regenerates 5 Energy.

Name: Hunter of Glacial Forest
Four-Piece Effect: After the wearer unleashes their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by 25% for 2 turn(s).

Name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
Four-Piece Effect: If the wearer's Break Effect is 150% or higher, ignores 10% of the enemy target's DEF when dealing Break DMG to them. When the wearer's Break Effect is 250% or higher, the Super Break DMG they deal to enemy targets additionally ignores 15% of the targets' DEF.

Name: Knight of Purity Palace
Four-Piece Effect: Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the shield created by the wearer by 20%.

Name: Longevous Disciple
Four-Piece Effect: When the wearer is hit or has their HP consumed by an ally or themselves, their CRIT Rate increases by 8% for 2 turn(s) and up to 2 stacks.

Name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
Four-Piece Effect: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, SPD for all allies increases by 12% for 1 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

Name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
Four-Piece Effect: The wearer's SPD increases by 6% and Basic ATK DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Passerby of Wandering Cloud
Four-Piece Effect: At the beginning of the battle, immediately recovers 1 Skill Point.

Name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
Two-Piece Effect: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%.
Four-Piece Effect: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn.

Name: Prisoner in Deep Confinement
Four-Piece Effect: For every DoT the target enemy is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of target's DEF when dealing DMG to them. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.

Name: Sacerdos' Relived Ordeal
Four-Piece Effect: When using Skill or Ultimate on one ally target, increases the ability target's CRIT DMG by 18%, lasting for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).

Name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
Four-Piece Effect: Increases DMG dealt by Skill and Ultimate by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.

Name: The Ashblazing Grand Duke
Four-Piece Effect: When the wearer uses follow-up attacks against the target enemy, increase the wearer's ATK by 6% for every time the follow-up attack deals DMG. This effect can stack for a maximum of 8 times and lasts for 3 turns. This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a follow-up attack.

Name: The Wind-Soaring Valorous
Four-Piece Effect: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 6%. When the wearer uses a follow-up attack, increase the DMG dealt by their Ultimate by 36%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

Name: Thief of Shooting Meteor
Four-Piece Effect: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, regenerates 3 Energy.

Name: Wastelander of Banditry Desert
Four-Piece Effect: When attacking debuffed enemies, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 10%, and their CRIT DMG increases by 20% against Imprisoned enemies.

Name: Watchmaker, Master of Dream Machinations
Four-Piece Effect: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, Break Effect for all allies increases by 30% for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.
